content:
Is there an API which can get the unread messages count for a user to show it on a different website or UI?

We are self-hosting Zulip Chat and we will be providing a Chat link for users to be able to navigate to it. However we also want to show unread message notification and counts on the Chat link itself. This link will be present on our own website, separate from the Zulip UI.
@Aniket Sinha you can do this with the /register API endpoint; I'm not sure we have a more single-purpose endpoint for that, but maybe we should add one.

@Tim Abbott Thanks for the response.

I went through the documentation and have a query. As per my understanding, if I send "message" and "update_message_flags" as the events to watch, I will receive the counts.

However how do I pass the specific user Id for whom I wish to load these counts?
@Aniket Sinha yeah, for that you'll need to make the request using the user's API key.
